Description: Wheelmade cup in a typical Meroitic style with flat base, low angular shoulder and straight walls with direct rim slightly lopsided, with a flat base, low carination and direct walls/rim. thick cream slip interior and exterior. Exterior decorated with frieze marked with two black painted lines above and below. Space filled with baubles of black painted lines at the top and the bottom, joined to form a zig-zag pattern with wavy black lines.
